NOTE:
----------
- In this case I've took a different approach to XVID encoding because the DVD is "bad word"... not so good. :)


- This is done by default (MPEG matrix)


- Mpeg quantization looks better at higher bitrates and H263 works better at lower bitrates.


- Filtering the hell out of everything as much as possible.


- Back to 63 xvid core (not so many bugs), and looks great... to me.


- Check the sample.


- Enjoy!



DIRECTOR: Dragan Bjelogrlic



CAST: Milos Bikovic, Nikola Djuricko, Armand Assante, Dragan Nikolic, Elena  MartÃƒÂ­nez, Vojin Cetkovic, Branko Djuric, Srdjan Todorovic, Sebastian Cavazza, ...


PLOT:
-----------
A football team from Belgrade, former Republic of Yugoslavia gets a chance to go to the First World Football Championship. But things complicate along the way.
